body_html: Hi, sorry for the delay in updates. We finished implementing the feature but still have not been able to access a machine with a GPU to test if it is fully functional. If anyone would like to help us finish testing and get the code base up to a state where we can submit a pull request I'd be more than happy to add them as a collaborator or they can fork my fork.

body: Hi, sorry for the delay in updates. We finished implementing the feature but still have not been able to access a machine with a GPU to test if it is fully functional. If anyone would like to help us finish testing and get the code base up to a state where we can submit a pull request I'd be more than happy to add them as a collaborator or they can fork my fork.
